issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Improve documentation for type coercion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10235](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10235). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The code / comments for type coercion are a little confusing and don't make the distinction between coercion and casting clear – we could improve the documentation to clarify this.
